text: Uton nu biddan ealle eadmodlice þysne halgan apostolnomenþæt he for his mæron gearnungum us geþingige to þam mildheortan Hælende, þæt he us gemilsige & sylle forgifennysse eallra ure synna, ðe we sið oððe ær geþohtan oþþe geworhtan ongean his leofan wyllan, & þæt he geunne us gesundfulnysse on þisre worulde & forgife us soðe sybbe on þysan lænan life & on þam towerdan ece reste on heofenanrice mid his eadigan apostolenomenþe we nu todæg wurþigeaþ, & mid eallon his halgan.
Seþe leofað & ricsað a buton ende on ecnysse, Amen.
